entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0008.6819] The calculation in the extension taxonomy rolling up from CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPosition to CashAndCashEquivalents in 1005005 - Statement - Statement of cash flows, direct method (Statement) is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base taxonomy. Check that the calculation is correct or that you have used the correct tag for the two elements identified in the calculation It is possible that the calculation is correct in the case of a reconciliation calculation. Check that the concept CashAndCashEquivalents is the correct calculation parent for this element.
Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9604] It is expected that OtherEquityInterest with a value of 67,078,351 reported in the network role http://ctt.pt/role/StatementoffinancialpositioncurrentnoncurrentStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherEquityInterestMember and a reported value of -43,998,612 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://ctt.pt/role/StatementofchangesinequityStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherEquityInterest fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of OtherEquityInterest : 0 Decimals of Equity : 0 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900G4A1IKOKC22K56/2021-12-31/ESEF/PT/0/002367-2021-12-31.zip/002367-2021-12-31/reports/002367-2021-12-31.xhtml 2612
